QueryDefinition.Query: with claims as ( SELECT distinct CASE WHEN NPI = '' or NPI = 'H' or NPI = 'HHHHHHHHHH' THEN NULL ELSE NPI END as NPI, DEA FROM {sc}.RX_CLAIMS ) ,a as ( SELECT distinct CAST(PROV as VARCHAR) PROVIDER, RTRIM(LTRIM(PROVCAT)) SPECIALTY_SOURCE, NULL AS NPI, NULL as DEA FROM {sc}.Medical_claims UNION SELECT distinct CASE WHEN NPI is not null and DEA is not null THEN NPI+ '-' + DEA ELSE ISNULL(NPI, DEA) END as PROVIDER, NULL SPECIALTY_SOURCE, NPI, DEA FROM claims ) SELECT RTRIM(LTRIM(PROVIDER)) PROVIDER, SPECIALTY_SOURCE, NPI, DEA FROM a
